name: Trauma Care
details: For emergency treatment of severe injuries and trauma cases.

details: Specialized care for burn victims and thermal injuries.

details: Risk factor reduction programs for patients with high cardiovascular risk.

details: Management of MS symptoms through medication and rehabilitation programs.

name: Stroke Rehabilitation

name: Headache Management
details: Treatment for various types of headaches, including migraines and cluster headaches.

name: Neuro-oncology Care

name: Prostate Cancer Treatment
